mapper.select:
select count(no) cnt from member
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
mapper.update: update member set status = 0 where no = #{no}
update member set status = 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into member_ban(member_no, end_date) values (#{no}, date_add(now(), interval #{add_date} day));
mapper.update: update member m inner join member_ban b on m.no = b.member_no set m.status = 0 where b.end_date < now();
mapper.delete: delete from member_ban where end_date < now();
